metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13766 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Use-after-free in accessibility in Google Chrome prior to 77.0.3865.75 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
